solution_line_template: Her siblings have brought a total of {num_siblings} siblings * {suitcases_per_sibling} suitcases each = <<{num_siblings}*{suitcases_per_sibling}={sibling_suitcases}>>{sibling_suitcases} suitcases.
Her parents have brought {num_parents} parents * {suitcases_per_parent} suitcases each = <<{num_parents}*{suitcases_per_parent}={parent_suitcases}>>{parent_suitcases} suitcases.
This is a total of {sibling_suitcases} + {parent_suitcases} = <<{sibling_suitcases}+{parent_suitcases}={total_suitcases}>>{total_suitcases} suitcases.
